item.title: Making life easier or at least better - Five month recap with a newborn
item.description: Note: This post contains referral links I’m in no way partnered with any brand mentioned but I was linking to products I use so I figured hey why not try referral links? I’m adamantly against giving advice about parenting. That’s why this post does not tell you what you should or should not be doing. It’s about things we’ve done that have worked well for us. Specifically it’s written around the lessons learned around from we use regularly.
